Uses of Class
com.st.st25sdk.ndef.NDEFRecord

  • Packages that use NDEFRecord 
    Package Description
    com.st.st25sdk.ndef  

    • Uses of NDEFRecord in com.st.st25sdk.ndef

      Subclasses of NDEFRecord in com.st.st25sdk.ndef 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AarRecord
      Implements AAR NDEF message Introduced in Android 4.0 (API level 14), an Android Application Record (AAR) provides a stronger certainty that your application is started when an NFC tag is scanned.
      class  BtLeRecord
      BtLeRecord is the class in charge of reading/writing Bluetooth Low Energy NDEF records.
      class  BtRecord
      BtRecord is the class in charge of reading/writing Bluetooth NDEF records.
      class  EmailRecord
      EmailRecord is the class in charge of reading/writing Email NDEF records.
      class  EmptyRecord
      Implements NFC Forum Empty NDEF record
      class  ExternalRecord
      Implements NFC Forum External NDEF message
      class  MimeRecord
      Implements NFC Forum MIME NDEF message
      class  SmsRecord 
      class  TextRecord
      Implements NFC Forum Text NDEF message Refers to NFCForum-TS-RTD_Text_1.0 http://members.nfc-forum.org/apps/group_public/document.php?document_id=5080
      class  UriRecord 
      class  VCardRecord
      Implements NFC Forum VCard NDEF message Refers to http://www.rfc-editor.org/info/rfc6350 vCard Format Specification
      class  WifiRecord
      WifiRecord is the class in charge of reading/writing WiFi NDEF records.
